# Maps

Zoom and pan in the map.

::: panel-tabset

## Overview

```{r}
librarian::shelf(
  dplyr, glue, here, leaflet, readr)

d <- read_csv(
  here("infographics/data/viewshed_locations.csv"),
  show_col_types = F)

d %>% 
  leaflet() %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$Esri.NatGeoWorldMap) %>% 
  addMarkers(
    lng   = ~lon,
    lat   = ~lat,
    label = ~location,
    popup = ~glue("{region}, {location}"))
```

## Humboldt

```{r}
d %>% 
  filter(
    region == "Humboldt") %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$Esri.NatGeoWorldMap) %>% 
  addMarkers(
    lng   = ~lon,
    lat   = ~lat,
    label = ~location,
    popup = ~glue("TODO: {region}, {location}"))
```
